message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $22,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point. What do you think?
Alice, $22,000 is way above my budget. I'm really interested in this product but I can only go up to $10,000.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
Alice, $18,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,000. This is my final offer, otherwise I'll have to go with another seller.
